page.title: 09Huntercombe Place - YCC
page.content: Huntercombe Place is a Youth Custody Centre.There are one hundred and ninety six bortsal boys and one hundred men to look after them.There are one hundred living quarters for the boys to share in groups of two or three to a quarter.The boys come from courts all over the country. There is a man he is the farmer provids food.There are two men who have being there sins 1973 when it opened.Thereis a big wood with 10,000 trees. Many of the officer's families live on site in the 39 homes provided and their children attend Nettlebed Primary School, or Langtree Comprehensive at Woodcote.The boys play cricket.
